credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Papal coat of arms
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite
description: Horizontal rectangle. Below is a base like an entablature. Upon it, in the center, is a pedestal covered by a cloth which has been raised from the front by two winged female genii blowing trumpets. In the front is a wreath of two branches. Upon the pedestal are the keys and the tiara. Below is a garland. Usual background.
name: Drawing
